A SECURE METHOD TO
SHARE YOUR FILES

We believe that confidentiality is of our clients' utmost importance. We work closely with our clients to deliver the best possible solutions for their needs

About Us

The internet has become something indispensable in our lives; it is in fact the fastest growing communication medium. With the gargantuan of data we currently have in the internet, security has been put in the limelight. In order to provide secrecy in the information that we transmit, we would have to employ steganographic techniques. However, each technology has its own boons and banes. In this project, we are going to harness one of the emerging cryptography techniques called visual cryptography. Visual cryptography makes use of human vision to decipher an encrypted image. Hence, it doesn't need any cryptography knowledge nor complex computation.



WE BELIEVE IN OUR GOAL

We aim to develop a secure user authentication system based on visual cryptography. Visual cryptography is a special cryptographic technique for hiding visual information in images.

The information can be decrypted only when the correct key image is used. In this product, we would apply a visual cryptographic technique to build a secure remote user authentication system.

We do understand that confidentiality is of paramount importance to some of the government organisations and private institutions that store highly sensitive data in their database. We provide a fuss-free application that allows you to be ress-assured that the files can only be read when all of the shareholders are present.
